title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2022
text: Thank you Chanca Piedra!  This product absolutely worked for me.  A 65 year old male diagnosed with a 6 mm kidney stone entering ureter on left side by CT scan.  First time in my life that I experienced this type of pain.  Couldnâ€™t sit, stand, lay down, nothing would ease the pain.  I was prescribed pain meds by the urologist and told I hade a 50/50 chance of passing the stone.  He told me to make a follow up appointment in 30 days to reassess the situation.My daughter did some on-line research for me and found this product.  We were impressed with the many positive reviews and ratings.  Faced with the proposition of being in pain for at least 30 more days and having to possibly go through other medical procedures to blast it or extract it, I figured what did I have to lose by trying Chanca Piedra.  I took two pills twice a day for eight days before passing the stone with no issue.  The pain meds helped me manage the pain while giving Chanca Piedra time to work.  I also took flowmax as directed by doctor, and 2 capsules of apple cider vinegar daily (I decided to add this on my own) and I drank lots of water.  All of this, coupled with Godâ€™s answer to my prayers, got me out of pain, out of this situation, and back to normal.A couple sandlike particles appeared in the toilet bowl 2 or 3 urinations prior to passing the big one - a 6mm diameter soft dark brown  deflated pea-shaped membrane that shot out while peeing with no pain or issue.  I am now pain and stone free.  I am such a believer in this product that Iâ€™m leaving this review for the next person in similar circumstance and telling anyone and everyone I know about this product

title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2020
text: My husband has intermittent bouts of Gout, depending on his diet, the weather, and how much water he does or does not drink.  When he has experienced an episode of it, he hurts.  It stinks to see someone I love hurt.I bought this supplement on a whim to see if it helped, and it has.  He states that he definitely feels better when he is taking this.  He can take this routinely, or he can take a medicine prescribed by his health care physician.  He says that this supplement reduces episodes, and that he feels better when he takes it.As to the science, it holds up.  While not approved by the FDA, clinical studies have found that chanca piedra reduces urinary oxalate and uric acid -- this stuff reduces the ability of your pee to create kidney stones.  A 2014 study found that chanca piedra has the ability to inhibit the growth of H. pylori, which, as an organism, is a jerk:  it's connected to cancer and stomach ulcers.  It has been found to help people with hep B by stopping its growth.  The reason that chanca piedra helps fight gout is that gout episodes occur when high levels of uric acid present in the body.  Less uric acid, less gout.My husband took this for a month to see a difference.  Now he asks me to re-order it when he is running low.  I take this as a real sign of its efficacy, because, well, he's a man.  Ha ha.I recommend that anyone with gout symptoms give it a try after reading up on its contraindications and talking to his or her doctor.  We did, and it is now a constant in his medicine cabinet.

I didn't have any more incidents, and sometimes it felt like I was passing fine "sand" in my urine but nothing painful. I recently had another kidney scan and they are now completely clear! I took two pills twice a day with food and I drank lots of Water. Had my ct scan 10 days later and no kidney stone to be seen. I watched videos on YouTube which shows the pain stages i would go through passing the stone and i can genuinely say it isnt called stone breaker for no reason. Cannot recommend it enough.
